location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4143/44 'Abdel Hamid Munir, Egyptian Chargé d'Affaires, Jedda'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a telegram from the British Embassy, Cairo, to the Bahrain Political Agency, requesting that facilities be granted to Abdel Hamid Munir, Egyptian Chargé d’Affairs in Jeddah, who is returning urgently to his post via Bahrain and has been unable to wait for a transit visa.
